title: Teal of the Institute: Alternate History Asian Steam World
description: Alternate history set in the East.Teal lives in an Institute with other sisters. No new children have been born pure. No new candidates who are "considered." She leaves the mountain refuge and makes her way to the settlement on the plains. Her skills as a Eugenie healer are in demand. She becomes an important player in the power struggles of the region. Her goal, to rescue her Institute and retain the knowledge and practice of the sisters leads her into many adventures. The country is riven by wars. Alliances form and break. She encounters airships and androids. Maya trees are scattered throughout the world. Their powers are embraced by the major Zara and Bodhist religions. Steampunk, gaslamp style. Reincarnation. Parallel Universe. Wuxia.
author: Chris   Harte
